puzzle.title: Character Arcs
puzzle.hint: This puzzle requires you to know some STAR TREK trivia [Memory Alpha](http://memory-alpha.wikia.com/wiki/Portal:People) is a good resource.
Each line indicates two things: a crossword-style clue followed by a STAR TREK character name.

The words are (in alphabetical order):
- dill - kick - leotard - lord - nag - quirk - sucker - Tories - wax - work

The character names are (in alphabetical order):
- Dax - Kirk - Leonard - Lore - Nog - Quark - Torres - Tucker - Will - Worf
Notice that only one letter differs between each normal word and the associated character name. In the given puzzle order, what do those letters spell?
TEN FORWARD (the name of the bar on the USS Enterprise, NCC-1701-D)
